website_summaries.verdict: Casual flip flops for summer strolling.
pros: Flip flops with a comfortable fit that can be worn on long-distance walks
These are a stylish pair of flip flops that will last
cons: Some customers felt that the straps were too narrow

customer_reviews.title: I've never had a pair of flip flops that I would wear prior to these.
customer_reviews.text: Going to have to get used to the strap between my toes, but other than that, I like them a lot ! I've never had a pair of flip flops that I would wear, but these are very nice and well made. I bought them on the recommendation from my wife. She has four or five pair in different colors and wears them constantly.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: OK,  JUST NOT GREAT.
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in these Flip Flops I thought that since they were made by Clark, they might be a better design. There are other Flip Flops out there that are better. I ended up giving them to a friend and buying myself some OluKai Ohana's
customer_reviews.author: Dog Lover

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable an good for beach or street
customer_reviews.text: High quality product. They are definitely built to last. Comfortable an good for beach or street. I have worn them almost every day for a long time and they are finally starting to wear. Bought a new pair but still wear these sometimes. Would have bought these again but the price went up.
customer_reviews.author: Jim K

customer_reviews.title: Nice sandals but too loose for my feet.
customer_reviews.text: Size and width were perfect but the strap was too loose fitting to feel secure on my feet. I could fit my whole index finger between my foot and the strap. I've been told my feet are a little thinner than normal and that may explain why they don't fit me.
customer_reviews.author: Q Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice filp-flop for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality for the price. I was hoping for more arch support though. The foot beds do show wear pretty quick but other than that they seem durable so far. The rubber foot bed also does cause the foot to sweat or get hot, but it's rubber/synthetic, so you shouldn't be surprised. Give them a shot.
customer_reviews.author: John Hock

customer_reviews.title: Really nice and comfortable sandal
customer_reviews.text: I got this sandal for my husband, he likes all shoes of Clarks brand. Really nice and comfortable sandal. We will buy one more in another color.
customer_reviews.author: Melisa

customer_reviews.title: Great Clarks Whelkie!
customer_reviews.text: My husband picked these out and loved them when they arrived. He says they are the best flip flop type shoe he has ever had and has worn them almost every day since receiving them.
customer_reviews.author: All Media Fan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great cushioning, but straps are too narrow for my son's feet.
customer_reviews.author: All About THE LOVE

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfy flip flops. They replaced my trusty Reefs and offer more of a cushiony experience as well as great arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Music Pro

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Looks Comfy,I know it's the correct size even though I didn't get them for myself. Delivery was on time,I'm happy and I love these clarkes flip flops I'll buy again for ME.
customer_reviews.author: marcia

customer_reviews.title: What are thoooooose?
customer_reviews.text: Worn them almost everyday this summer, great look and extremely durable. I'll be grabbing another pair next summer, and not because these are ruined.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Nixon

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable sandal
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband who lives in sandals during the summer. His favorite before these were another big name brand. These are so comfortable he is switching to Clarks as his new favorite. He likes the style and the arch and said he could walk a pretty good distance in these.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Allen

customer_reviews.title: Pure comfort!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not a big flip flop guy But these are REALLY comfortable! So much so I bought these as a second pair for a trip this year.
customer_reviews.author: Firefighter 1

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Best flip flop I've owned. I can walk comfortably in these. Only negative I have is they fit a little tight across the top of my foot and wish they were just a little bit wider
customer_reviews.author: dan brinkman

customer_reviews.title: They fit and feel great.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves Clark's and she bought me these. They fit and feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Mary S.

customer_reviews.title: Great flip flops
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband. He says they ate like walking on air.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I hope this lasts me a couple years.
customer_reviews.author: JustFit

customer_reviews.title: Love these. Buying a 2nd pair
customer_reviews.text: The fit, comfort, style are perfect! I bought a 2nd pair of these.
customer_reviews.author: rich

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very satisfied with these flip flops and they fit as expected. Delivery was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Clarks Mens Whelkie Beach Flip Flop Black, 12M
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, fit as expected, fast delivery and good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Mikhail Nakhla

customer_reviews.title: Good Flip Flop
customer_reviews.text: I really like the flip flops. They provide a lot of cushioning, and therefore had to be broken in before I could feel fully comfortable in them. They look really nice as well. My only complaint is that they don't provide good traction on smooth surfaces, but you can't have it all:)
customer_reviews.author: Zerogratzi

customer_reviews.title: A very good product, met most of my expectations
customer_reviews.text: A very good product, met most of my expectations, it was however too loose, allowing my feet too much free movement.
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of cushion and arch support. Seem well made. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: I love it very much
customer_reviews.text: I love it very much. But do not wear it when you take a shower. Comfortable all the time. I worn it during my spring break to Puerto Rico, it was great.
customer_reviews.author: Wen Dong

customer_reviews.title: runs large
customer_reviews.text: excellent product but fit too large. my husband wears an 11.5 shoe, so I got him a pair of size 10, and they are way too big. I am thinking a 9 would still be a bit big but a better fit.
customer_reviews.author: sistahips

customer_reviews.title: Sandals are built well but seem a bit small. ...
customer_reviews.text: Sandals are built well but seem a bit small. My hope is that as I wear them they will stretch out a bit. If they don't they will be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: The Blackest Eyes

product_meta.title: Clarks Men's Whelkie Beach Flip Flop
product_meta.description: Clarks has been in business for over 100 years making very fine men's dress shoes in a variety of styles. Featuring a wide range of top-quality components, Clarks gives you the options you desire in the quality you demand.
feature_bullets: Everyday flip flop with sporty sole and casual stripe strap
